document_data.mainbody:
Orgul Telethar was a tanner inhabiting Waterdeep, the City of Splendors, during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Orgul was the guildmaster for the League of Skinners & Tanners circa 1357 DR. He held the title of "Leaguemaster" within the guild and worked out of Telethar Leatherworks and the League Hallâ€”the guild headquarters on the Tower Trail in the Dock Ward.
